<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get BRC-20 Holders</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/brc20/{ticker}/holders"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get the holders of BRC-20 by ticker.

## Request
